page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: About 138 of working age:- 2 unemployed, 9(all housewives)with part-time jobs.(e.g.2 school secretar- ies,school cook),16 self-employed- farmers, agric. contractors,a graphic designer, the 2 shopkeepers,the post mistress,a home-based selling business, coal merchant,2 self-employed farm workers, agric. engineer. 39 employed in manual work, 37 in managerial, professional and technical work. 4 full-time students, 31 women at home,as housewives, i.e. not retired, not earning for many hours per week. {AGRICULTURAL WORK} Only 9 men in the village of Aston earn therir living fromfull-time farm work, as farmers, farm workers, agric. contractors. One man earns part of his living from his smallholding. All working men in Appletree work on the farm there.
